Package javelin.view.screen.haxor

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BorrowMoney
    Will lend money to a Squad once but will get it back on a future visit.
    ChangeAvatar
    Changes the image used to represent a Combatant.
    Hax
    A trick to be done by Haxor.
    HaxorScreen  
    Materialize
    Generate a WorldActor near Haxor
    Rebirth
    Return an unit to it's original Monster form.
    RemoveAbility
    Remvoes a single undesired ability from a Combatant.
    Ressurect
    One-time offer to ressurect a fallen friendly Combatant.
    SummonAlly
    One-time offer to recruit one extra starting squad member from the starting character set.
    Win
    If you conquer 7 Keys, unlock their challenges and survive you can "win the game".
